proposal: Hey there, Domi community! As a high-performance blockchain for SocialFi, you're all about speed, security, and scalability. We've got some tools that could help you further your mission, like our CrossChain for creating an EVM compatible blockchain bridge or our DAO for governance and proposals. Imagine the possibilities with 1664 holders already in the game. Let's make the fast, faster. See my profile for demo and details.
